summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定在用户通过在单词中拖动鼠标来选择单词的一部分时是否同时选定该单词的其余部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether when a user selects part of a word by dragging across it with the mouse, the rest of the word is selected.

value.span: 如果启用自动选择字词，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic word selection is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用后, 每次用户使用鼠标拖动单词的一部分时, 将自动展开所选内容, 以包含整个单词。When is enabled, every time that part of a word is selected by the user dragging over part of a word using the mouse, the selection is automatically expanded to include the whole word. 用户可以通过在所选内容中暂时反转拖动鼠标指针的方向, 来覆盖整个单词的自动选择。The user can override automatic selection of a whole word by momentarily reversing the direction in which the mouse pointer is being dragged as the selection is made. 此操作将撤消整个单词的自动选择, 并使用户能够精确选择部分或全部单词。This action undoes the automatic selection of the whole word, and enables the user to precisely select part or all of the word. 如果禁用, 则不会自动扩展所选内容以包含全字; 在这种情况下, 将始终手动确定精确选择。When is disabled, a selection is not automatically expanded to include whole words; in this case, precise selections are always determined manually. > [!NOTE] > 自动选择不会影响用户拖动的第一个单词。Auto selection does not affect the first word that the user drags across. 它仅在越过第一个单词边界之后, 自动选择才会生效。It is only after this first word boundary is crossed that auto selection takes effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginChange() cil managed

summary.span: 开始更改块。

span.span: Begins a change block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 当你调用时, 还必须调用来完成更改块, 否则将会引发异常。When you call , you must also call to complete the change block otherwise an exception will be thrown. 更改块以逻辑方式将多个更改组合到一个撤消单元中, 并阻止在更改块后引发文本内容或选择更改事件。A change block logically groups multiple changes into a single undo unit and prevents text content or selection change events from being raised until after the change block. 这样, 便可以对文本元素进行多次编辑, 而不会因另一个侦听器同时更改文本元素的风险。This way you can make multiple edits to the text element without the danger of the text element being changed at the same time by another listener. 更改块是通过调用方法创建的。A change block is created by calling the method. 调用方法会导致所有后续更改都包含在指定的更改块中, 直到对方法进行了相应调用。 Calling the method causes all subsequent changes to be included in the specified change block until a corresponding call to the method is made. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法来创建更改块。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create a change block. [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#BeginChangeEndChangeCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/BeginChangeEndChangeExample.cs#beginchangeendchangecodeexampleinline1)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#BeginChangeEndChangeCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/beginchangeendchangeexample.vb#beginchangeendchangecodeexampleinline1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置`false`为可清除撤消堆栈。Setting this property to `false` clears the undo stack. 因此, 如果您禁用撤消, 然后重新启用它, 则撤消命令仍不起作用, 因为当您禁用 undo 时, 撤消堆栈会被清空。Therefore, if you disable undo and then re-enable it, undo commands still do not work because the undo stack was emptied when you disabled undo. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]的属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. summary.span: 锁定应用程序的撤消堆栈的最新撤消单元。

span.span: Locks the most recent undo unit of the undo stack of the application.

summary.span: 这将阻止锁定的单元与后续添加的撤消单元合并。

span.span: This prevents the locked unit from being merged with undo units that are added subsequently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将非文本撤消单元添加到应用程序的主撤消堆栈时调用此方法。Call this method when a non-text undo unit is added to the application's main undo stack. 这将阻止锁定的单元与后续添加的撤消单元合并。This prevents the locked unit from being merged with undo units that are added subsequently.

summary.span: 只要未处理的 路由事件在其路由中到达此类，就会调用此方法。

span.span: Called whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法, 则仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的有些类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \* 方法上的事件模式: 它可让你通过使用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it lets you handle the matching event from derived classes by using a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可能由子元素引发, 这不一定是调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that invokes handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要考虑事件参数的源属性 (在大多数情况下, 不应尝试重新引发该事件)。Therefore, your implementation needs to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 当沿路由接收事件时, 的子类可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种方案是采用事件的参数, 并特意将事件标记为已处理。One scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类实现了此方法, 则仍建议在实现中调用 base ()。Calling base() in your implementation is still recommended, in case an intermediate class in the inheritance implemented this method. 您可以根据自己的要求, 在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base ()。You may call base() either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的目的有些类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \* 方法上的事件模式: 它可让你通过使用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it lets you handle the matching event from derived classes by using a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可能由子元素引发, 这不一定是调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that invokes handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要考虑事件参数的源属性 (在大多数情况下, 不应尝试重新引发该事件)。Therefore, your implementation needs to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 在路由中收到事件时, 的子类可以选择调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of can choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种方案是采用事件的参数并将事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario is to take the arguments of the event and mark the event as handled.
